entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as playing with her food and glancing at the window every few minutes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as noticing Fleur's behavior.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill returns before they had finished their first course and has his long hair tangled by the wind.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is mentioned as having settled in.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny sends her love to Fleur and the others.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as operating an Owl-Order business out of his mother's back room.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as operating an Owl-Order business out of his mother's back room.

entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Muriel is mentioned as being driven up the wall by Fred and George's business.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna mentions that her father has made a tiara.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is mentioned as having a ludicrous headdress on his visit to Harry and the others.

relationships.description: Bill informs Fleur that everything's fine.
Fleur helps Muriel by returning her tiara.
Fred and George collaborate on an Owl-Order business out of their mother's back room.
Luna informs Harry that her father has made a tiara.
